00017 CEndingEp3::CEndingEp3(CMap &map, std::vector<CPlayer> &Player) :
00018 CFinale(map),
00019 m_Player(Player)
00020 {
00021  m_Episode = 3;
00022  m_step = 0;
00023  m_starttime = g_pTimer->getTicks();
00024  m_timepassed = 0;
00025  m_mustsetup = true;
00026  m_mustfinishgame = false;
00027  m_counter = 0;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void CEndingEp3::process()
00031 {
00032  m_timepassed = g_pTimer->getTicks() - m_starttime;
00033 
00034  switch(m_step)
00035  {
00036  case 0: HonorScene(); break;
00037  case 1: PaparazziScene(); break;
00038  case 2: AwardScene(); break;
00039  default:
00040   m_mustfinishgame = true;
00041   break;
00042  }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void CEndingEp3::HonorScene()
00046 {
00047  if(m_mustsetup)
00048  {
00049   //Initialization
00050   std::string path = m_Map.m_gamepath;
00051   CMapLoader MapLoader(&m_Map, &m_Player);
00052   MapLoader.load(3, 81, path);
00053 
00054   m_Player[0].hideplayer = false;
00055   m_Player[0].moveTo(244<<STC, 104<<STC);
00056   m_Player[0].sprite = 0;
00057 
00058   m_Map.gotoPos(32, 32);
00059   m_Map.drawAll();
00060 
00061   m_TextBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_ESEQ_PAGE1"), true));
00062   m_TextBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_ESEQ_PAGE2"), true));
00063   m_TextBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_ESEQ_PAGE3"), true));
00064   m_TextBoxes.push_back(new CMessageBox(g_pBehaviorEngine->getString("EP3_ESEQ_PAGE4"), true));
00065 
00066   int newtile = m_Map.at(2,12);
00067   for(int x=0 ; x<22 ; x++) // This changes to the Oh No! Tiles to normal Stone-Tiles
00068   {
00069    m_Map.changeTile( x, 15, newtile);
00070    m_Map.changeTile( x, 16, newtile);
00071   }
00072 
00073   m_mustsetup = false;
00074  }
00075 
00076  if(!m_TextBoxes.empty())
00077  {
00078   CMessageBox *pMB = m_TextBoxes.front();
00079 
00080   pMB->process();
00081 
00082   if(pMB->isFinished())
00083   {
00084    delete pMB;
00085    m_TextBoxes.pop_front();
00086   }
00087  }
00088  else
00089  {
00090   m_step++;
00091   m_mustsetup = true;
00092  }
00093 }
00094 
00095 // here comes a short flashing effect
00096 void CEndingEp3::PaparazziScene()
00097 {
00098  if(m_mustsetup)
00099  {
00100   m_Timer.ResetSecondsTimer();
00101   g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CFlash(500, 32, 0xFFFFFF, 200));
00102   m_mustsetup = false;
00103  }
00104 
00105  if(m_counter==30 || m_counter==60 || m_counter==90)
00106   g_pGfxEngine->pushEffectPtr(new CFlash(500, 32, 0xFFFFFF, 200));
00107 
00108  m_counter++;
00109 
00110  if(m_Timer.HasTimeElapsed(3000))
00111  {
00112   m_step++;
00113   m_mustsetup = true;
00114   m_Player[0].hideplayer = true;
00115   m_Player[0].moveToForce(330<<STC, 104<<STC);
00116   m_Player[0].sprite = 0;
00117  }
00118 }
00119 
00120 void CEndingEp3::AwardScene()
00121 {
00122  if(m_mustsetup)
00123  {
00124   //Initialization
00125   m_Player[0].hideplayer = true;
00126   m_Map.gotoPos(0,0);
00127   m_Map.resetScrolls(); // The Scrollsurface must be (0,0) so the bitmap is correctly drawn
00128   m_Map.m_animation_enabled = false; // Needed, because the other map is still loaded
00129   m_Map.drawAll();
00130   mp_FinaleStaticScene = new CFinaleStaticScene(m_Map.m_gamepath, "finale.ck3");
00131 
00132   mp_FinaleStaticScene->push_string("THE_END", 6000);
00133 
00134   m_mustsetup = false;
00135  }
00136 
00137  if( !mp_FinaleStaticScene->mustclose() )
00138  {
00139   mp_FinaleStaticScene->process();
00140  }
00141  else
00142  {
00143   // Shutdown code here!
00144   delete mp_FinaleStaticScene;
00145   mp_FinaleStaticScene = NULL;
00146   m_Map.m_animation_enabled = true;
00147   m_step++;
00148   m_mustsetup = true;
00149  }
00150 }
00151 
00152 CEndingEp3::~CEndingEp3() {
00153  while(!m_TextBoxes.empty())
00154  {
00155   delete m_TextBoxes.front();
00156   m_TextBoxes.pop_front();
00157  }
00158 
00159  SAFE_DELETE(mp_FinaleStaticScene);
00160 }
